name: Take You Out
album_name: 陈小春的R&B音乐补给站VOL.2 柔情篇
lyric:
Luther Vandross - Take You Out
Yeah yeah yeah
Here it is
She caught me by surprised I must say
Cause I never have seen such a pretty face
With such a warm and beautiful smile
It wasn't hard for me to notice her style
I was fascinated surely
She took my heart and held it for me
I wouldn't let her get away
Not until she heard me say
Excuse me miss (Yeah )
But what's your name
Where are you from (Heh ) and can I come
And possibly "Can I take you out tonight"
To a movie (Yeah ) to the park
I'll have you home (Oh Hoo ) before it's dark
So let me know "Can I take you out tonight"
Don't care if I get rejected
At least then I won't regret
Regret the fact I missed the chance for romance At least
I'll walk away knowing
I tried my best and I'm going
I'm going on with my day
Cause at least she heard me say
Excuse me miss (Come On)
But what's your name
Where are you from (Hey You) and can I come
And possibly "Can I take you out tonight"
To a movie (Yeah ) to the park
I'll have you home (Oh Hoo ) before it's dark
So let me know "Can I take you out tonight"
Excuse me miss (Oh I wanna know you are think I can show you good love)
But what's your name
Where are you from and can I come
And possibly "Can I take you out tonight"
To a movie (Tonight) to the park (Don't Worry)
I'll have you home (eh ) before it's dark
So "let me know can I take you out tonight"
Heh That's why I had to come over
And introduce myself to you
Cause you're never gonna know
Where you'll find love oh hoo
And hopefully I found it in you Oh yeah
Excuse me miss
But what's your name (Oh oh yeah )
Where are you from and can I come
And possibly (Oh Yeah ) "Can I take you out tonight"
To a movie (Got a love for you baby ) to the park
I'll have you home (I'll come get you baby ) before it's dark
So let me know (Heh heh ) "Can I take you out tonight"
Excuse me miss (come on Tonight)
But what's your name
Where are you from (eh Tonight) and can I come
And possibly "Can I take you out tonight" (Hoo )
To a movie to the park (yeah)
I'll have you home (Hoo oh ) before it's dark
So let me know can I take you out tonight (Let me make a house a home baby )
Excuse me miss
But what's your name (yah yah )
Where are you from (ah ) and can I come (oh can I come)
And possibly "can I take" you out "tonight"
To a "movie to the park"
"I'll have you home before it's dark"
"So let me know can I take you out tonight"
Excuse me miss

爸爸给我听的。很喜欢
